Oxnard.Murder of Larry King:
Lawrence Fobes King (January 13, 1993 – February 13, 2008), known as Larry King, was a 15-year-old gay student at E.O. Green Junior High School in Oxnard, California. He was shot twice by a fellow student, 14-year-old Brandon McInerney, and kept on life support until he died two days later.
Newsweek described the shooting as "the most prominent gay-bias crime since the 1998 murder of Matthew Shepard", bringing attention to issues of gun violence as well as gender expression and sexual identity of teenagers.
